function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Close proximity to dams, dilapidated buildings, and swamps increases disease prevalence","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission and outbreak","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough site selection and assessment to avoid high-risk areas","Technologies":"Geospatial mapping and data analysis tools","People":"Construction project teams, building owners, public health officials","Owner":"Construction project teams, building owners, public health officials"},{"Description":"Buildings constructed using traditional materials are susceptible to mosquito intrusion","Impact":"Increased risk of mosquito-borne diseases","Mitigation":"Exploration of material science for innovative solutions to repel mosquitoes","Technologies":"Innovative building materials, mosquito-repelling coatings","People":"Architects, construction material scientists, public health officials","Owner":"Architects, construction material scientists, public health officials"}]}
